author: Jamie MacFarlane
comment: I like busy looking stuff and this is busy. Battery life is ok too. But Think it would be nice to have some colour options. Like you know to pick a color for ambient mode or something.
title: Love it!

author: Philip Carson
comment: Add step count to the design and make the calendar, step count and weather interactive then it would get 5 stars
title: Great watch face of only........

author: Dave J
comment: Thank you ☺ working great now and love the color in ambient.

reply.author: NeFa Studio
reply.content: Changed default ambient brightness to 20% (was 100%), and added color option in v1.5.

title: Great since update

author: dmar droimar
comment: ... if only the text fit on the moto 360
title: Good but...

author: Shane Wyatt
comment: Such a unique face that provides a ton of information at a glance. I've yet to test how this effects battery life on my LG G watch, but there are very cool scheduling options included in the face settings. I think a few areas could be cleaned up a bit, but overall, this is a fun and unique way of telling time on android wear. If you like the look, this is definitely worth a purchase. This is my new default face!
title: Almost perfect.
